text: We support local and international groups in the analysis and implementation of energy investment structures, which allow them to achieve efficient development in the country based on their particular objectives, through effective operation, adequate interaction with their international business partners and adequate compliance with their tax obligations. We accompany our clients in the preparation of financial models for the evaluation of their long-term projects, as well as in the evaluation and design of funding alternatives based on the characteristics of each project, to achieve adequate fundraising by institutional investors, public or private. We provide support for participation in government bids and auctions, as well as in joint infrastructure development processes, so that from the beginning all the fiscal considerations of the corresponding project are taken into account.
